tag_list: music, indomite, elad, collaburation, marketing, start-up, israel, share, online, community
overview:
Elad Meidar is a motivated entrepreneur and co-founder Social Ninjaz (Along side Lior Levin), a young an vivid social web applications bakery.

Prior to co-founding Social Ninjaz, where he operates as a CTO, Mr. Meidar rolled for SeekingAlpha.com , one of the largest professional online economy networks. At SeekingAlpha, he was responsible technical aspects for legacy systems upgrades and interacted with strategic companies as Google, Microsoft and others. Meidar had advised US and Israeli high-tech startups on strategy, product road maps and technology architecture.

Mr. Meidar got his start in the technology industry in the Israeli army, where he served an IT department engineer for the Intelligence Core. After leaving the military in 2005, he joined a web development startup Creopolis as a CTO.

In the rare break from spending long hours hovering around Social Ninjaz and the “Status Search.net” product and strategy, meeting with associates and investors, Mr. Meidar plays on an electric guiter, drums, flute and a Kazu, Currently majoring Computer information systems Bs.c in NSU Florida.
